ygData.subject: Re: human wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lots of platinum, yes. 20pp with good charisma and reputation with your guild for a level 30+ spell... ... Fellow Wizard. I don t understand why any race
ygData.messageBody:
According to Wizard:
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> now i understand at level 16 or close to that wizards need to
> >research to get new spells...
>
> All four magic user clases get a research at lv. 16 but as i have seen in
> shops you can buy many higher lv spels also there but a cost is realy high.

Lots of platinum, yes. 20pp with good charisma and reputation with your guild
for a level 30+ spell...

> I hope that this help until you get your hands on Everquest :)
> Silverion
> High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)

Fellow Wizard.

I don't understand why any race would want to become a wizard. That's for us.
